      • localTimeFromDate

        public static LocalTime localTimeFromDate(Date date)
        Converts a Date object into LocalTime.
        Parameters:
        date - The date to convert.
        Returns:
        A LocalTime containing the time info of the given date.
        See Also:
        dateFromLocalTime(LocalTime), localDateFromDate(Date)

      • dateFromLocalTime

        public static Date dateFromLocalTime(LocalTime localTime)
        Converts a LocalTime object into Date.
        Parameters:
        localTime - The local time to convert.
        Returns:
        A Date containing the time info of the given localTime. The date is set to January 1st, 2000.
        See Also:
        localDateFromDate(Date), localTimeFromDate(Date)

      • localDateFromDate

        public static LocalDate localDateFromDate(Date date)
        Converts a Date object into LocalDate.
        Parameters:
        date - The date to convert.
        Returns:
        A LocalTime containing the date info of the given date.
        See Also:
        dateFromLocalTime(LocalTime), localTimeFromDate(Date)

      • makeUrlClickableEditorPane

        public static void makeUrlClickableEditorPane(JEditorPane editorPane)
        Allow links contained in a JEditorPane to be opened in default system browser when clicked. Adds a HyperlinkListener to the given editorPane.
        Parameters:
        editorPane - The editor pane to modify.

      • htmlEditorPaneFactory

        public static JEditorPane htmlEditorPaneFactory(String html,
                                                String style)
        Builds a JEditorPane given a HTML to display and a style to apply.
        Parameters:
        html - The HTML to display. Must not contain <html> nor <body> tags.
        style - The style to apply. Must be formatted as CSS.
        Returns:
        The built JEditorPane with the given CSS and HTML.
        See Also:
        htmlEditorPaneFactory(String)

      • htmlEditorPaneFactory

        public static JEditorPane htmlEditorPaneFactory(String html)
        Builds a JEditorPane given a HTML to display. Will apply a default style.
        Parameters:
        html - The HTML to display. Must not contain <html> nor <body> tags.
        Returns:
        The built JEditorPane with the given CSS and HTML.
        See Also:
        htmlEditorPaneFactory(String, String)

      • isMac

        public static boolean isMac()
        Checks if the app is running on a Mac system.
        Returns:
        true if running on a mac, false otherwise.

      • dayOfWeekFromString

        public static DayOfWeek dayOfWeekFromString(String s)
        Returns the day of week from the given string. Only parses French.
        Parameters:
        s - The day of week, in French ("lundi", "mardi", ...).
        Returns:
        The DayOfWeek value.
